did.abstract: The 1864 certificate of discharge of Private John Connelly from Company F, 84th Regiment, New York State Infantry Volunteers.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection consists of a single document.

bioghist.head: Biographical note
bioghist.p: Private John H. Connelly was from New York City. He served in Lt. Henry Brown's 84th Regiment of the New York State Infantry during the American Civil War. Connelly fought and was disabled at the Battle of Gettysburg in July 1863. He was discharged on account of wounds suffered in the battle.
